body:
### Describe the bug

Cython crashes when using `bool.__name__`, with an AttributeError: 'BuiltinObjectType' object has no attribute 'scope'. This started happening with version 3.1.1, and works fine with 3.1.0.

### Code to reproduce the behaviour:

```cython
print(bool.__name__)
```


### Expected behaviour

The code compiles.

### OS

Linux

### Python version

3.11.2

### Cython version

3.1.1

### Additional context

```
Error compiling Cython file:
------------------------------------------------------------
...
bool.__name__
    ^
------------------------------------------------------------

test.pyx:1:4: Compiler crash in AnalyseExpressionsTransform

File 'Nodes.py', line 409, in analyse_expressions: StatListNode(test.pyx:1:4)
File 'Nodes.py', line 6096, in analyse_expressions: ExprStatNode(test.pyx:1:4)
File 'ExprNodes.py', line 624, in analyse_expressions: AttributeNode(test.pyx:1:4,
    attribute = '__name__',
    initialized_check = True,
    is_attribute = 1,
    member = '__name__',
    needs_none_check = True,
    op = '->',
    use_managed_ref = True)
File 'ExprNodes.py', line 7717, in analyse_types: AttributeNode(test.pyx:1:4,
    attribute = '__name__',
    initialized_check = True,
    is_attribute = 1,
    member = '__name__',
    needs_none_check = True,
    op = '->',
    use_managed_ref = True)
File 'ExprNodes.py', line 7851, in analyse_as_ordinary_attribute_node: AttributeNode(test.pyx:1:4,
    attribute = '__name__',
    initialized_check = True,
    is_attribute = 1,
    member = '__name__',
    needs_none_check = True,
    op = '->',
    use_managed_ref = True)
File 'ExprNodes.py', line 7896, in analyse_attribute: AttributeNode(test.pyx:1:4,
    attribute = '__name__',
    initialized_check = True,
    is_attribute = 1,
    member = '__name__',
    needs_none_check = True,
    op = '->',
    use_managed_ref = True)

Compiler crash traceback from this point on:
  File "/home/abderrahimkitouni/.local/share/uv/tools/cython/lib/python3.13/site-packages/Cython/Compiler/ExprNodes.py", line 7896, in analyse_attribute
    entry = obj_type.scope.lookup_here(self.attribute)
            ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^
AttributeError: 'BuiltinObjectType' object has no attribute 'scope'
```

comment_data.body: Bisecting the error leads to bcdea468b09feccee6b4db4dade07645612d0c97

title: [BUG] Regression: Compiler crash when accessing bool.__name__
